name: Orb of Deception
description:
Overview

Orb Of Deception is a 2D metroidvania game with low resolution pixel art graphics in which you control a nameless character born from nothing, who wears a mask and a tunic and uses a strange orb which damages the enemies it touches by throwing it and returning it to him. You will go through areas full of sinners, hostile creatures with black and white masks that will attack you, discovering as you advance the secrets of the lonely world in which our protagonist exists.

Controls

A D - Horizontal move.

Space bar - Jump.

Left click - Throw orb.

Right click - Change orb color.

W - Interact.

Escape - Open/Close menu.
